tables.title: Derelict Starship Events
tables.description: Creeping discoveries while exploring powerless vessels between the stars.

entries.result: Frozen coffee floats in beads across the galley as gravity flickers.
An SOS repeats in a dead language, then switches to a crew member's voice.
A maintenance bot still patrols, dutifully welding shut any opened hatch.
Cargo crates pulse with faint light, synchronized to approaching footsteps.
The ship's map shows corridors that do not physically exist.
A cryo pod cycles open, revealing only frost and a missing occupant.
Gravity reverses for a moment, slamming loose tools toward the ceiling.
An AI core speaks in riddles, demanding a passphrase that references starlore.
Footprints appear in dust ahead, leading to an airlock with no exterior scorch.
A fungal growth feeds on coolant, releasing hallucinogenic spores.
Weapon lockers are open, weapons untouched, ammo neatly stacked elsewhere.
A data crystal contains the last captain's confession and coordinates.
